field-descriptions.type: string describing the piece type, e.g., 'straight' or 'curve'
field-descriptions.length: length of the piece in millimeters, or null if not applicable. Do not specify length for angled pieces. We calculate it from the radius and angle.
field-descriptions.angle: angle in degrees. For straight pieces, set to 0. For curved pieces, set to the curve angle.
field-descriptions.radius: radius in millimeters. For straight pieces, set to null.
